channel.title: Making webclients
channel.description:
I noticed alot of people having trouble making a web client so I'm here to offer my help.
What I will do: Make your webclient Host it if you need
Either PM me, post, or add my MSN av0ided-@live.com, do not add me and ask for help making one, I will make you one but I'm not your help center to guide you through making it yourself.
